1. 九 きゅう と 六 ろく . 2. 陽 よう と 陰 いん , 陽 よう と 陰 いん が 合 がっ して 万物 ばんぶつ が 生 しょう ずる 理 り . 3. 'Nine and six'. Japanese slang used to ridicule wrestlers who have a record of 9 wins and 6 losses in one tournament and do not have a double-digit record. It is often used for ōzeki who are then called kunroku ōzeki.
